name: Keller and Heckman LLP
goal:
Promoting the interests of clients in the food, food packaging, chemicals and consumer products industries, KH will:
a. Seek to protect and promote the trade and welfare of these industries with due regard to the public interest;
b. Foster, promote and defend the business interest of KH clients in these industries by facilitating proper and lawful consideration and exchange of information upon questions affecting them;
c. Represent these industries in all relevant forums to identify relevant local, national, and regional issues of importance to them and coordinate appropriate responses and their submission to the competent audience; and
d. Do all such acts and things necessary to promote the general welfare of clients in these industries and for the accomplishment of the objects hereinabove set forth or which shall be recognized as proper objectives of a law firm, including but not limited to:
i. Providing relevant updates on legislative and regulatory developments;
ii. Providing advice and counsel on such legislative and regulatory developments;
iii. Representing clients in these industries vis-Ã -vis government bodies, national and international institutions and organizations, and other stakeholders

euInitiatives: All relevant acts and guidelines issued by the EU on Food Law regulations, including the Nutrition and Health Claims Regulations, the Food Information Regulation, the Fortification Regulation, the Novel Foods Regulation, the Food Additives, Flavourings and Enzymes Regulations, the Plastics Regulation, EU Reach and related Chemical and Environmental Regulations, the Biocides Regulation, EU Privacy and Data Security Regulations, the relevant draft amendments currently being discussed, such as the draft BPA Regulation, the revision of the Ceramics Directive, the Drinking Water Directive.
